snippet: The company says its existing investment arm has set up a $100 million pool of money earmarked for start-ups that can create apps for the Salesforce mobile app platform.
abstract: The company says its existing investment arm has set up a $100 million pool of money earmarked for start-ups that can create apps for the Salesforce mobile app platform.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Salesforce.com to Set Up a Venture Capital Fund
